ARABIC: وَمَن يَأْتِهِۦ مُؤْمِنًا قَدْ عَمِلَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلدَّرَجَٰتُ ٱلْعُلَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But as for those who come to Him as muminun, having done right actions, they will have the highest ranks:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But whoever comes before Him a believer having done good deeds, will be raised to higher stations --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But he who comes to Him with faith and righteous works shall be exalted to high ranks,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: One who comes into the presence of his Lord with faith and righteous deeds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the one who presents himself as a believer before Him, having done good deeds – so for them are the high ranks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But whoever comes to Him as a believer, and has done righteous good deeds, for such are the high ranks,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And whoever comes to Him a believer (and) he has done good deeds indeed, these it is who shall have the high ranks,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And whoso comes unto Him a believer having done deeds of righteousness, those -- for them await the most sublime degrees;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But whoso cometh unto Him a believer, having done good works, for such are the high stations;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But he who comes to Him as a believer, having done good deeds, shall be exalted to the highest ranks,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And whosoever cometh unto Him as a believer, and he hath done righteous works---then these! for them are ranks high.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But whoever comes to Him with faith and he has done righteous deeds, for such shall be the highest ranks
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But such as come to Him as Believers who have worked righteous deeds,- for them are ranks exalted,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But whoever comes to Him (Allah) as a believer (in the Oneness of Allah, etc.), and has done righteous good deeds, for such are the high ranks (in the Hereafter),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But for whosoever comes before Him as a believer and having done good works there awaits the most highest degree;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But whoever comes to Him a believer, having worked righteousness—these will have the highest ranks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But whoever comes to Him as a believer having done righteous deeds - for those will be the highest degrees [in position]:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:75] And whoever comes to Him a believer, having performed righteous deeds — the obligatory and supererogatory deeds, for such shall be the highest degrees (al-‘ulā, the plural of ‘ulyā, the feminine form of a‘lā) —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But whoso cometh unto Him) on the Day of Judgement (a believer) sincere in his faith, (having done good works) secretly between himself and his Lord, (for such are the high stations) in the Gardens;
